body:
So Halo reserved a scrim server for the LoLs . So I decided to try and work on a defence with the Rilo's help.
I think the defence is ok. But I need your guys opinions.Feel free to put anything.
http://imgur.com/a/QLptu
body_tagged:
So Halo reserved a scrim server for the LoLs . So I decided to try and work on a defence with the Rilo's help.
I think the defence is ok. But I need your guys opinions.Feel free to put anything.
http://imgur.com/a/QLptu
title: Opinions on a Wahiz defense

replies.body: Instead of pressure plates use buttons on crafting tables.
replies.body_tagged: Instead of pressure plates use buttons on crafting tables.

replies.body: ok xD i had alot of time in my hands xD
replies.body_tagged: ok xD i had alot of time in my hands xD

replies.body: In that case I wouldn't really put anything there, but if I have to, would put plates. Buttons are destroyed by water.
replies.body_tagged: In that case I wouldn't really put anything there, but if I have to, would put plates. Buttons are destroyed by water.

reply_to.body: Instead of pressure plates use buttons on crafting tables.
reply_to.body_tagged: Instead of pressure plates use buttons on crafting tables.

replies.body: And over the buttons place signs or gates :D
replies.body_tagged: And over the buttons place signs or gates :D

reply_to.body: In that case I wouldn't really put anything there, but if I have to, would put plates. Buttons are destroyed by water.
reply_to.body_tagged: In that case I wouldn't really put anything there, but if I have to, would put plates. Buttons are destroyed by water.

replies.body:
You wont have time to make that kind of defense on that map.
In my opinion, you should focus gettin a 6-8 block high wall up in this area http://prntscr.com/azr3cm
 
If you would like, you can then make a bigger wall behinde that, but I never usually have time for that, and I barley ever get rushed nowdays.

replies.body: Generally, I really liked that. But the very first wall might rushers help skybridge. You can make it lower. And I think you should make the last wall higher. That will disable sky pushes better. That's all I can say. Really good defence. I'm also a defender and I do similar defenses on Wahiz, too.
replies.body_tagged: Generally, I really liked that. But the very first wall might rushers help skybridge. You can make it lower. And I think you should make the last wall higher. That will disable sky pushes better. That's all I can say. Really good defence. I'm also a defender and I do similar defenses on Wahiz, too.

replies.body: Always make your walls progressively shorter, the tallest in the back, shortest in the front, or else the walls behind will be pointless.
replies.body_tagged: Always make your walls progressively shorter, the tallest in the back, shortest in the front, or else the walls behind will be pointless.

reply_to.body: Generally, I really liked that. But the very first wall might rushers help skybridge. You can make it lower. And I think you should make the last wall higher. That will disable sky pushes better. That's all I can say. Really good defence. I'm also a defender and I do similar defenses on Wahiz, too.
